00056     ///////////////////////////////////
00057     // ActorBase class fuctions
00058     ActorBase::ActorBase (String name, String file, String group)
00059     {
00060         this->GameWorld = World::GetWorldPointer();
00061         this->node = this->GameWorld->GetSceneManager()->GetGraphicsWorldPointer()->createSceneNode();
00062         this->GameWorld->GetSceneManager()->GetGraphicsWorldPointer()->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(this->node);
00063         this->Shape = new btEmptyShape();
00064         this->CreateEntity(name, file, group);
00065         this->GraphicsSettings = new ActorGraphicsSettings(this,entity);
00066         MotionState = NULL;
00067         ActorSounds = NULL;
00068         Animation = NULL;
00069         ShapeIsSaved = false;
00070         ActorType = ActorBase::Actorbase;
00071     }
00072 
00073     ActorBase::~ActorBase ()
00074     {
00075         DetachFromGraphics();
00076         delete MotionState;
00077         if(!ShapeIsSaved)
00078         {
00079             delete Shape;
00080         }
00081         //delete entity;
00082         this->GameWorld->GetSceneManager()->GetGraphicsWorldPointer()->destroyEntity(entity);
00083         //delete node;
00084         this->GameWorld->GetSceneManager()->GetGraphicsWorldPointer()->destroySceneNode(node);
00085         if(CollisionObject)
00086         {
00087             delete CollisionObject;
00088         }
00089     }
00090

00093     Ogre::ResourceGroupManager* ActorBase::GetOgreResourceManager()
00094     {
00095         return Ogre::ResourceGroupManager::getSingletonPtr();
00096     }

00098     void ActorBase::InitializeEntity(bool ForceReinitialize)
00099     {
00100         DetachFromGraphics();
00101 
00102         bool AnimSet = false;
00103         bool AnimEnable = false;
00104         bool AnimLoop = false;
00105         Real AnimPos = 0;
00106         String AnimName = "";
00107         if(Animation)
00108         {
00109             AnimSet = true;
00110             AnimEnable = Animation->getEnabled();
00111             AnimLoop = Animation->getLoop();
00112             AnimPos = Animation->getTimePosition();
00113             AnimName = Animation->getAnimationName();
00114         }
00115 
00116         String MatName = entity->getMesh()->getSubMesh(0)->getMaterialName();
00117 
00118         entity->_initialise(ForceReinitialize);
00119 
00120         entity->getMesh()->getSubMesh(0)->setMaterialName(MatName);
00121 
00122         if(AnimSet)
00123         {
00124             Animation = entity->getAnimationState(AnimName);
00125             Animation->setLoop(AnimLoop);
00126             Animation->setEnabled(AnimEnable);
00127             Animation->setTimePosition(AnimPos);
00128         }
00129 
00130         AttachToGraphics();
00131     }
00132

00172     Vector3 ActorBase::GetOgreLocation() const
00173     {
00174         Vector3 temp;
00175         temp.ExtractOgreVector3(this->node->getPosition());
00176         return temp;
00177     }

00179     void ActorBase::SetBulletLocation (Vector3 Location)
00180     {
00181         //btTransform* temp = this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform();
00182         this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform().setOrigin(Location.GetBulletVector3());
00183     }

00185     Vector3 ActorBase::GetBulletLocation() const
00186     {
00187         Vector3 temp;
00188         //btTransform trans = this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform();
00189         temp.ExtractBulletVector3(this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform().getOrigin());
00190         return temp;

00255     void ActorBase::AttachToGraphics ()
00256     {
00257         Vector3 tempv;
00258         Quaternion tempq;
00259         tempv = GetBulletLocation();
00260         tempq.ExtractBulletQuaternion(CollisionObject->getWorldTransform().getRotation());
00261         this->node->setPosition(tempv.GetOgreVector3());
00262         this->node->setOrientation(tempq.GetOgreQuaternion());
00263         this->node->attachObject(this->entity);
00264     }
00265 
00266     void ActorBase::DetachFromGraphics ()
00267     {
00268         this->node->detachObject(this->entity);
00269     }
00270 
00271     void ActorBase::SetActorScaling(Vector3 scaling)
00272     {
00273         this->node->setScale(scaling.GetOgreVector3());
00274         this->Shape->setLocalScaling(scaling.GetBulletVector3());
00275     }

00293     void ActorBase::SetAnimation(ConstString &AnimationName, bool Loop)
00294     {
00295         if(this->IsAnimated())
00296         {
00297             Animation->setEnabled(false);
00298         }
00299         Animation = entity->getAnimationState(AnimationName);
00300         Animation->setLoop(Loop);
00301     }
00302 
00303     void ActorBase::EnableAnimation(bool Enable)
00304     {
00305         if(Animation)
00306         {
00307             Animation->setEnabled(Enable);
00308         }
00309     }
00310 
00311     bool ActorBase::IsAnimated()
00312     {
00313         if(Animation)
00314         {
00315             return Animation->getEnabled();
00316         }else{
00317             return false;
00318         }
00319     }
00320 
00321     void ActorBase::AdvanceAnimation(Real Time)
00322     {
00323         if(Animation)
00324         {
00325             Animation->addTime(Time);
00326         }
00327     }
00328 
00329     void ActorBase::RemoveSetAnimation()
00330     {
00331         if(Animation)
00332         {
00333             Animation->setEnabled(false);
00334             Animation = NULL;
00335         }
00336     }

00368     void ActorBase::EnableCollisionResponse()
00369     {
00370         switch (ActorType)
00371         {
00372             case ActorBase::Actorrigid:
00373             {
00374                 ActorRigid* Rigid = static_cast<ActorRigid*> (this);
00375                 Rigid->RemoveObjectFromWorld(GameWorld);
00376                 this->CollisionObject->setCollisionFlags(CollisionObject->getCollisionFlags() - btCollisionObject::CF_NO_CONTACT_RESPONSE);
00377                 Rigid->AddObjectToWorld(GameWorld);
00378                 break;
00379             }
00380             case ActorBase::Actorsoft:
00381             {
00382                 ActorSoft* Soft = static_cast<ActorSoft*> (this);
00383                 Soft->RemoveObjectFromWorld(GameWorld);
00384                 this->CollisionObject->setCollisionFlags(CollisionObject->getCollisionFlags() - btCollisionObject::CF_NO_CONTACT_RESPONSE);
00385                 Soft->AddObjectToWorld(GameWorld);
00386                 break;
00387             }
00388             case ActorBase::Actorterrain:
00389             {
00390                 ActorTerrain* Terrain = static_cast<ActorTerrain*> (this);
00391                 Terrain->RemoveObjectFromWorld(GameWorld);
00392                 this->CollisionObject->setCollisionFlags(CollisionObject->getCollisionFlags() - btCollisionObject::CF_NO_CONTACT_RESPONSE);
00393                 Terrain->AddObjectToWorld(GameWorld);
00394                 break;
00395             }
00396             case ActorBase::Actorragdoll:
00397             {
00398                 return;
00399                 break;
00400             }
00401             default:
00402                 return;
00403         }
00404     }
00405 
00406     void ActorBase::DisableCollisionResponse()
00407     {
00408         switch (ActorType)
00409         {
00410             case ActorBase::Actorrigid:
00411             {
00412                 ActorRigid* Rigid = static_cast<ActorRigid*> (this);
00413                 Rigid->RemoveObjectFromWorld(GameWorld);
00414                 this->CollisionObject->setCollisionFlags(CollisionObject->getCollisionFlags() + btCollisionObject::CF_NO_CONTACT_RESPONSE);
00415                 Rigid->AddObjectToWorld(GameWorld);
00416                 break;
00417             }
00418             case ActorBase::Actorsoft:
00419             {
00420                 ActorSoft* Soft = static_cast<ActorSoft*> (this);
00421                 Soft->RemoveObjectFromWorld(GameWorld);
00422                 this->CollisionObject->setCollisionFlags(CollisionObject->getCollisionFlags() + btCollisionObject::CF_NO_CONTACT_RESPONSE);
00423                 Soft->AddObjectToWorld(GameWorld);
00424                 break;
00425             }
00426             case ActorBase::Actorterrain:
00427             {
00428                 ActorTerrain* Terrain = static_cast<ActorTerrain*> (this);
00429                 Terrain->RemoveObjectFromWorld(GameWorld);
00430                 this->CollisionObject->setCollisionFlags(CollisionObject->getCollisionFlags() + btCollisionObject::CF_NO_CONTACT_RESPONSE);
00431                 Terrain->AddObjectToWorld(GameWorld);
00432                 break;
00433             }
00434             case ActorBase::Actorragdoll:
00435             {
00436                 return;
00437                 break;
00438             }
00439             default:
00440                 return;
00441         }
00442     }

00444     bool ActorBase::CheckActivation()
00445     {
00446         int Activation = this->CollisionObject->getActivationState();
00447         if( ACTIVE_TAG == Activation )
00448         {
00449             return true;
00450         }else{
00451             return false;
00452         }
00453     }

00457         return entity;
00458     }
